about_the_game:
There have been reports of cat murders in South-East Portland. No one knows if its a person or animal mutilating the cats.

Play as CatMxn a random guy who goes to sleep and enters a dream with new found abilities and is called to action by Cat Deities. When he wakes up his life is forever changed and something different is in the air. Why can he now understand what the cats are telling him. Is that a meow or a "help me"?

In this game you will:
  • Harness the primal power of cats.
  • Navigate the 2-D world as you try to go to work on time.
  • Punch and transform into a cat to ultimately hunt down and attack BucketHead cat abuser.

This is a story based 2-D platformer video game adaptation of an original YouTube Film "CatMxn". The story was inspired by events that happened in Portland, Oregon between 2009-2020.

content_descriptors.notes:
Censored Cartoon Nudity, Cartoon Blood, Marijuana Use, Swearing, Cartoon Violence

***Trigger Warning for Animal Abuse and Violence Implied. Graphic Scenes***

detailed_description:
There have been reports of cat murders in South-East Portland. No one knows if its a person or animal mutilating the cats.

Play as CatMxn a random guy who goes to sleep and enters a dream with new found abilities and is called to action by Cat Deities. When he wakes up his life is forever changed and something different is in the air. Why can he now understand what the cats are telling him. Is that a meow or a "help me"?

In this game you will:
  • Harness the primal power of cats.
  • Navigate the 2-D world as you try to go to work on time.
  • Punch and transform into a cat to ultimately hunt down and attack BucketHead cat abuser.

This is a story based 2-D platformer video game adaptation of an original YouTube Film "CatMxn". The story was inspired by events that happened in Portland, Oregon between 2009-2020.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any year 2010 +
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard and gamepads
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Year 2020 +
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 560 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard and gamepads

name: CatMxn: Chapter 1

  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard and gamepads

short_description: A random guy is thrown into the role as a feline champion. Harnessing the primal power of cats, he must face terrifying trials with his new found powers. This leads him to hunting down cat killers on the dark web.
